name: Hearth (adam4813, HiImWren, RubenTipparach)
description:
Hearth is a horror/action FPS which takes you head to head with hordes of monsters as you escort the last hope of humanity: a steam-train called "Hearth". Shoot grotesque monsters and use flaming magic to defend the train and guide it to the end of the tracks. Be vigilant! If the train takes too much damage and loses it's heat, the world will be engulfed in frozen darkness forever.

Controls
WASD - move
LMB - fire
E - Flamethrower
Q - Phoenix Wings

Objective
Keep the train alive by killing the oncoming monster hordes. Use the Flamethrower and Phoenix powers up to defeat them faster. Each monster defeated gives the train more energy.
